meanings.definition: A person who travels or journeys on foot, especially in the mountains.
meanings.sent1: The trekker enjoyed the scenic views while hiking up the mountain.
meanings.sent2: The group of trekkers set out early in the morning to explore the trails.
meanings.sent3: The trekker accidentally took a wrong turn and ended up on a steep slope!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to reach the summit made her a true trekker in spirit.
meanings.sent5: The trekker's backpack was filled with essentials for the long journey ahead.

meanings.definition: A fan or enthusiast of the science fiction television series Star Trek.
meanings.sent1: As a dedicated trekker, he never missed an episode of Star Trek.
meanings.sent2: The convention was buzzing with excited trekkers dressed as their favorite characters.
meanings.sent3: The young trekker proudly displayed his collection of Star Trek memorabilia.
meanings.sent4: Her love for Star Trek made her a true trekker at heart.
meanings.sent5: The group of trekkers debated about the best Star Trek episodes over lunch.

meanings.definition: A person who takes part in a long-distance hike or trek.
meanings.sent1: The experienced trekker knew how to pace himself during the long hike.
meanings.sent2: She joined a group of trekkers for the challenging expedition across the desert.
meanings.sent3: The trekker joked that their backpack felt heavier with each step they took.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of his friends, he was the ultimate trekker, always ready for an adventure.
meanings.sent5: The trekker's determination to finish the trek inspired others to keep going.
